summary: A tournament is watched by dozens of wealthy men betting on which one of the 30 assassins will survive the next 24 hours "kill or die" and claim the USD10,000,000 prize. It takes place in an English town with plenty of CCTVs.
cast: Robert Carlyle|Kelly Hu|Ian Somerhalder|Liam Cunningham|Ving Rhames|Sebastien Foucan|Craig Conway|John Lynch|Nick Rowntree|Rachel Grant|Bashar Rahal|Andy Nyman|Iddo Goldberg|Scott Adkins|Camilla Power|Tamika Cameran|Bill Fellows|J.J. Perry|Marie Hynes|Tony Mooney|Mark Stobbart|Kaloian Vodenicharov|Jonathan Frank|Petya Dimitrova|Atanas Srebrev|Gary Young|John Warburton|Dustin Ingle|Victoria Higginson|Andrey Slabakov|Velimir Velev|Zarko Karatanchev|Michael McCoy|Tom Wu|Harry Anichkin|Julian Vergov|Yordan Gospodinov|Kitodar Todorov|Vicror Boychev|Erica Wild|Sophie Wilson|Hayley Broxup|Suzanna Anderson|Paul Lyas|Cliff Heaton|Kevin McMahon|Jo Leith|John Beagley|Des Traynor|Rick Broxup|Gaz Randle|Terry Coogan|Phil Quinn|Velizar Binev|Winston Carrington|Sel-Vin Kuik|Nathan Doyle|Andrew Sutch|David Slater|Nisar Smiler|Steve Tomkow|Alan Graves|Neil Mountain|Paul Bowels|Robbie Hardy|Thomas Newton|Alisa Brusowska|Thomas Craig|Borislav Iliev|Oliver Jones|Siso Kamburov|Chris Kenyon|Robert Laity|Kristina Pavlova
title: El gran torneo
